overview:
Alex Smith is a serial entrepreneur and investor in Latin America. He holds two position at this moment as CEO of Suagi (a soon to be launched start up focused in social video) and iURL (a leading interactive agency based in Argentina with offices in 4 countries and clients among Coca Cola, HP, Lego, Ogilvy, Wunderman, DDB, etc)

Alex started iURL with only 19 years in his house in Buenos Aires Argentina. His interest in Computing Software became at 7 years old when his father bought he and his older brother Brian (a professional Race Driver) their first computer a Atari 64 bits.

Before starting his company he was also a professional race driver driving in Europe and Argentina until he decided to dedicated full time to technology. His first experiences with the Internet was in 94 when he develop as free lancer websites and apps for small companies.

He is the son of Nestor Miguel and Josefa Smith and has two brother’s and two sister’s He is very passionate about three things in life. his company, his family and motor racing.

He has a Degree in Business Administration in the Universidad del Salvador and has been writing for a number of magazines and blogs in Latin America for the last 6 years.

He has been working interactive advertising for the past 12 years creating campaigns for top fortune 500 companies all over the world.

Alex is 31 years old is married to Maria de Lujan Barboza and they have two daughters (Mia 3 and Chloe 10 months old)
